climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 💙𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐮𝐦 𝐌𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐲 𝐅𝐨𝐚𝐦 𝐒𝐞𝐚𝐭 𝐂𝐮𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐨𝐧: Crafted from high-quality memory foam, our seat cushion offers exceptional comfort and support, everlasting comfort pillow pad alleviates butt pressure, and provides coccyx support.

💙𝐓𝐏𝐄 𝐆𝐞𝐥 𝐄𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐧𝐨𝐥𝐨𝐠𝐲: Our seat cushions incorporate TPE gel enhanced and cooling technology, soft gel seat cushion for long sitting pressure relief, especially in hot weather. The gel-infused essentials enhanced cushion density for improved support and prevent heat buildup.

💙𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐥𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭: Our chair cushion is suitable for various seating needs, including office desk chairs, car seats, gaming chairs, wheelchair and more. It features a washable cover, a built-in handle for portability and a non-slip rubber bottom that keeps them in place.

💙𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐏𝐚𝐢𝐧 𝐑𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐞𝐟: From orthopedic lab, our ergonomic pillow helps relieve lower back pain, sciatica, hip and tailbone discomfort. It promotes healthy posture, reduces pressure points, and ensures lasting relief during long sitting.
💙𝐎𝐫𝐭𝐡𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐜 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧: Our therapeutic seat cushions are expertly crafted to encourage proper spinal alignment. They are trusted for their comfort and effectiveness in alleviating pain.
🎁Perfect gifts of office chair cushion, car seat cushion pad and chair cushions for family and friends.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What is the size of this seat cushion? This cushion measures 18.1'' * 14.2'' * 3.3'' in length, width and height. Wait 10 seconds after unpacking and the cushion will rebound back to this size. Is this chair pad suitable for heavy people? Sure. Best for adults 100 - 300 lbs. Does it really give a firm support? This seat cushion combines heat-responsive memory foam with a honeycomb gel layer. It molds to your shape for customized support and retains its form with each use. What is the difference between this one and others ? What is the added benefit of the TPE gel layer? The cushion core is combined with TPE cooling gel layer and pure memory foam layer. This design will adjust the sitting feeling to the most comfortable zone which is neither too hard nor soft, neither too cold nor hot. Does these cushions have after-sales service? Sure, 100% Money-Back Satisfaction for everyone - GOLENER wants you to be completely happy with these seat cushion! If not, we will solve your problems at the first time. No questions asked. Order our seat cushions today with zero risk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Behind Is feeling
reviews.reviewText: A lot better my husband‘s has no complaints. The support he is receiving from this cushion seat allows him to just feel so much joy and relaxation while driving he loves sitting on this seat. The support he is receiving is priceless for him. The cost was very reasonable received this product on time for his usage. The stitching of the fabric is well made for the right support and comfort. This cushion works very well for the rear body part, Trust us. If you’re doing a lot of sitting down, this will work wonders for your behind. we highly recommend this cushion for the pain relief, for the comfort, for the ergonomics, and definitely the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is both comfortable and sturdy and it really helps with back and leg pain when I have to sit for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as soft as I had hoped.
reviews.reviewText: It certainly provides padding, but it's more rigid than I expected. The shape is also less ergonomic than some.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice comfortable cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not really good if you are 250+ pounds
reviews.reviewText: My office chair cushion has almost completely gone flat and I wanted to buy something to get some relief. I read reviews and most said this cushion was good. I've been using it for 4 work days now and I just cant find any comfort. For me when I sit on it, it flattens completely and almost hurts worse to sit on than my bland office chair cushion. Very disappointed. I wanted it to work out!! :( For reference I am an 5'9" female and I weigh 265 pounds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very much needed
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my father as he ages he is up less than sitting in his chair more. Was having some break down on his backside, so got this to try and relieve that pressure. Once he figured out how to use it and make sure it was turned the right way. It helped him very much. It has taken the pressure off his tailbone while still being comfortable. He says it doesn’t feel bulky at all underneath in his recliner. I highly recommend this to anyone needing to relieve pressure due to an injured tail bone or to assist with diminishing pressure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Liked it so much I purchased another for my home.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased one of these seat cushions for my work chair. I liked it so much a purchased another for my home office. It helps with my sciatica.
